id.title: The database ID of the vehicle.

make_id.title: The database ID of the vehicle's make.

model_id.title: The database ID of the vehicle's model.

submodel_id.title: The database ID of the vehicle's submodel.

year_id.title: The database ID of the vehicle's year.

created_at.title: The creation date of the vehicle.

updated_at.title: The date the vehicle was last updated.

deleted_at.title: The date the vehicle was deleted.
